name: Room One (BlackQuiltro)
description:
Your insurgent squad has reached Room #1 and is in possession of the secret weapon plans...

You must hold the room until the upload is complete!

LUDUM DARE #37
Squad based gameplay.
Click on squad member to act. Each action spends ActionPoints:
- Move (1AP)
- Aim (0 AP)
- Heal (2AP)
- Special Power (3 AP)

APs replenish over time. Protect the upload droid too!

Game is playable but did not have time to polish at all. expect some bugs.

Source code: https://github.com/SeldonSL/lu...
